system.description:
You gain resistance to necrotic and radiant damage, your hit point maximum cannot be reduced, and whenever you are healed by a spell, it heals you an additional amount equal to the spell’s level.

In addition, if you would damage an undead creature with a spell or ability that deals necrotic damage, you may instead choose to heal it for the same amount.
system.prerequisite: Level 10 Witch Class; Gray Watcher archetype
